Text: Re Meeting Requested Cc ask Rebekah to try to set it up for Monday KG Vince J CT PM To Kevin GarlandEnron NRON NRON cc Rebekah RushingEnron nron Communications Vince J CT Subject Re Meeting Requested Kevin Lets meet for lunch next week Monday of Friday would be best We can talk about the project and decide who has the right skills to help you The person who supports EBS is Stinson Gibner and his lead person is Martin Lin My secretarys number is Shirley Crenshaw Vince To Vince J CT cc Rebekah RushingEnron nron Communications Subject Meeting Requested Vince I would like to meet with you or someone in your group to discuss some of the investment ideas and structures we are exploring How is your group structured these days Who would be best for me to meet Might you be available for lunch next week I will have my assistant contact you Thank Kevin Garland

Re Seismic Data on Oil Gas field Development via Satellite Cc be a business opportunity with this company but I would not advise making an investment Kevin Garland Richard Reichardt PM To Mike CT cc Larry LawyerEnron nron Communications Tom GrosEnron nron Communications Vince J CT Kevin GarlandEnron nron Communications Richard DiMicheleEnron nron Communications Ken RiceEnron nron Communications Subject Seismic Data on Oil Gas field Development via Satellite Mike Using NASA satellite transmission of maritime data and establishing a Houston Data Center to consolidate and centrally process D seismic data surveys for oil and gas extraction exploration and development could save the petroleum industry more than million dollars annually through reduced operational expenses Added value in shortening the time to process and deliver the finished surveys should generate more than million per site based upon barrel for average oil well production to market days soonerin revenue By reselling this data to market analysts or by internally using this data for forecasting future oilgas production Enron could increase the accuracy of forecasting reserves and production capabilities globally By holding the data as exclusive or partially exclusive Enron would have a significant market advantage in futures pricing for oil and gasVinces team is quantifying the valuation of this information Attached please find an updated version of the business case for seismic data transfer via satellite by a geophysicist at SpaceData William K Aylor calculated using barrel oil Based upon your availability Jon Adler and I would like to make a presentation to you or your designated representative on the Enron potential of this opportunity sometime next week October SDT Business Casepdf VR Richard Reichardt Enron Broadband Services Office Mobile Smith Street Suite EB Houston Texas

Re Meeting Requested Cc ask Rebekah to try to set it up for Monday KG Vince J CT PM To Kevin GarlandEnron NRON NRON cc Rebekah RushingEnron nron Communications Vince J CT Subject Re Meeting Requested Kevin Lets meet for lunch next week Monday of Friday would be best We can talk about the project and decide who has the right skills to help you The person who supports EBS is Stinson Gibner and his lead person is Martin Lin My secretarys number is Shirley Crenshaw Vince To Vince J CT cc Rebekah RushingEnron nron Communications Subject Meeting Requested Vince I would like to meet with you or someone in your group to discuss some of the investment ideas and structures we are exploring How is your group structured these days Who would be best for me to meet Might you be available for lunch next week I will have my assistant contact you Thank Kevin Garland

RE Summary of Bloomberg PowerMatchs European Proposalpst As I suspected KG Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Friday August AM To Garland Kevin Cc Sherriff John Zipper Andy Lewis Richard Subject RE Summary of Bloomberg PowerMatchs European Proposal The old Andrew Hasuman meeting it happens to all of us We have proabably had meetings with this guy Believe me we should not waste our time we did pursue Europe in the discussions too If you want further details ring Andy Thanks anyway Louise Original Message From Garland Kevin Sent Friday August AM To Kitchen Louise Subject FW Summary of Bloomberg PowerMatchs European Proposal Louise I took a meeting with this guy from Bloomberg at Whalleys request Attached is Bloombergs idea to set up a power trading companyplatform in Europe They would want us to commit trades in exchange for equity I am not interested in the equity but I told them I would distribute the idea to the proper people It is also being floated around the London office If you want you can respond to this guy directly or I can take care of it Kevin Garland Original Message From ANDREW HAUSMAN BLOOMBERG NEW YORK mailto Sent Friday August PM To Garland Kevin Subject Summary of Bloomberg PowerMatchs European Proposal Kevin I have also sent a hardcopy of the attached letter Andrew Hausman

FW Summary of Bloomberg PowerMatchs European Proposalpst Louise I took a meeting with this guy from Bloomberg at Whalleys request Attached is Bloombergs idea to set up a power trading companyplatform in Europe They would want us to commit trades in exchange for equity I am not interested in the equity but I told them I would distribute the idea to the proper people It is also being floated around the London office If you want you can respond to this guy directly or I can take care of it Kevin Garland Original Message From ANDREW HAUSMAN BLOOMBERG NEW YORK mailto Sent Friday August PM To Garland Kevin Subject Summary of Bloomberg PowerMatchs European Proposal Kevin I have also sent a hardcopy of the attached letter Andrew Hausman

Re Following uppst Ken Rice recommended that at refer this person to you He has been with Dell for years and is interested in joining one of Enrons trading or origination businesses Do you have any interest in him Kevin Garland Forwarded by Kevin GarlandEnron Communications on PM Ken Rice AM To Kevin GarlandEnron nron Communications cc Subject Re Following up I would send him to EES both Dave Delainey or Janet Dietrich or ENA Louise Kitchen or Dave Duran Kevin Garland PM To Ken RiceEnron nron Communications Kevin HannonEnron nron Communications cc Subject Following up This guy is one of the people from Dell Ventures that we have worked with He is interested in joining Enron specifically the tradingorigination side of Enron I think he might fit best in ENA Who should I refer him to KG Forwarded by Kevin GarlandEnron Communications on PM PM To Kevin GarlandEnron nron Communications cc Subject Following up Kevin Thanks for the time this morning As I mentioned after very successful years at Dell in program management product management and business development Im starting to consider the possibility of leaving Given my experiences here leveraging the power of commoditizing Intelbased servers markets a natural next step is a company like Enron Any appropriate introductions would be greatly appreciated Regards msg PS Ive also sent your name to Ray Bell at SmartPipes What theyre doing could be a natural complement to Enrons efforts in the bandwidth space Michael Green Dell Ventures Michael Greenvcf Michael Greenvcf Embedded StdOleLink

Sale of COPEL Shares Cc FYI Enron Principal Investments has completed the sale of Enrons ownership in COPEL Total proceeds for the last months from this sale is over million in cash Steven Sheldon managed this process In the last months EPI has sold or otherwise disposed of investments with total proceeds to Enron of over million in cash We intend to sell another by year end generating an additional million to million in cash The team is very focused on selling of the portfolio creating cash and minimizing losses Kevin Garland

Investments Meeting Agenda Cc John Wes and Michael The purpose of tomorrows meeting is to discuss a few of the investments that we are planning on transferring to the new investment group The specific issues are as follows Encorp the value of this investment was written up from million to million in Q without justification It should be written back down at the end of this quarter Otherwise we are going to have a bigger problem later Dais Analytic same issue as above Investment was written up from million to million It should be written back down this quarter AMPS This is a problem This company is going to continue to need capital an additional million immediately well beyond what Enron should be funding I am not willing to provide this company with ongoing funding without significant further evaluation If it is that important to the strategic effort of ENA then I recommend that ENA continue to manage the company and provide financing Bridgeline After further evaluation it is clear that this is not a merchant investment and should not be moved to my group I spoke with Jeff Donahue and we both agree that if you want it sold then his team should be the right one to do it Copel This one is fuzzy but Jeff Donahue and I have agreed that one of us should take responsibility for exiting this investment We still need to figure this one out KG

Enron Technology Investment Committeeis time for the rd quarter Technology Investment Committee TIC meeting I will have my assistant Rebekah Rushing contact you to set the date time and location The four groups to be represented are Enron Broadband Ventures Enron NetWorks Enron North America and Enron Economic Development Partners I it is my suggestion that we make the meeting hour and allow a max of minutes to each group Thanks KG

Enron Technology Investment Committeeis time for the rd quarter Technology Investment Committee TIC meeting I will have my assistant Rebekah Rushing contact you to set the date time and location The four groups to be represented are Enron Broadband Ventures Enron NetWorks Enron North America and Enron Economic Development Partners I it is my suggestion that we make the meeting hour and allow a max of minutes to each group Thanks KG

Enron Principal Investments Strategy Cc Rick Our group has completed our new investment strategy and are preparing to move into the execution phase I would appreciate the opportunity to present the strategy to you Dave Gorte and Randy Petersen It would take about hour and I would value your feedback Let me know if you are up for it and I will have my assistant schedule it Thanks KG

RE Enron Principal Investments Strategy Cc We will wait to you get back I had heard of your illness I hope you are recovering well You are not missing much here just mass hysteria KG Rebekah Please check with Ricks assistant to schedule a time to present our strategy to Dave Gorte Randy Peterson and Rick as soon as he returns Original Message From Buy Rick Sent Thursday August PM To Garland Kevin Subject RE Enron Principal Investments Strategy Kevin I would love to here the story but I am out recovering from an illnessvacation Wont be back until after labor day If you want to present to Dave and Randy please proceed or wait untill I get back Rick Original Message From Garland Kevin Sent Thu PM To Buy Rick Cc Rushing Rebekah Subject Enron Principal Investments Strategy Rick Our group has completed our new investment strategy and are preparing to move into the execution phase I would appreciate the opportunity to present the strategy to you Dave Gorte and Randy Petersen It would take about hour and I would value your feedback Let me know if you are up for it and I will have my assistant schedule it Thanks KG

FirstWorldFirstWorld announced the company would not meet its projections for the next quarters and the resignation of CEO Sheldon Ohringer The stock is trading at less than per share near our original basis We sold of our position for million ENA still holds million warrants Kevin G

Upcoming YPO Meeting Hosted by Jeff Skilling Cc Jeff Skilling president of Enron recently asked that I recommend a visionary venture capitalists to speak at an upcoming YPO meeting that he is hosting I recommended that Mr Skilling contact you as a possible speaker He will likely be calling you in the near future to make this request I know that you are busy but would appreciate your consideration in this matter I hope all is well Thanks Kevin Garland Enron Broadband Ventures

Cc With the recent burst of the Internet and communications bubble in the public equity markets I wanted to send you an email describing our position exposure and ongoing strategy Our aggressive use of accounting management vehicles and early sales of positions has significantly reduced our accounting volatility and economic exposure Hopefully the following points will address the appropriate issues Currently we have invested million in companies Of that approximately million still has accounting exposure The other million invested has either been hedged or already written down Our disciplined use of Fair Value accounting has allowed us to minimize accounting risk by not writing up investments simply because of improving market conditions Specifically Avici Sycamore and FastForward have generated approximately million in earnings this year DEN Salus Media and IAMcom have combined for million in writeoffs Recently I have done a review of our portfolio and I believe our accounting loss exposure for is limited Over of our portfolio companies have raised enough capital to sustain them through all of So if the markets private and public are closed I do not believe these companies will risk bankruptcy during Also our discipline of only coinvesting with big partners helps assure these companies will continue to get funding Going forward we are making certain revisions to our strategy to take compensate for and take advantage of the weak markets Limiting venture investments to technology companies that we have a competitive advantage in assessing the technology risk Also moving our venture effort earlier stage to take more technology risk and less market risk We are beginning to look at other types of private equity investments There are many public companies whose stock prices are at or less of their highs I still believe that the fundamentals of the industries indicate that the vast majority of these companies will go bankrupt However there will be a select few that will survive and will end up with reduced competition and big markets These companies will be big winners We are carefully looking for these I will keep you informed as this develops If you have any other questions please let me know Thanks Kevin Garland

Amber and StorageApps Acquired Cc In a absolutely dead tech market two of the EBS portfolio companies announced they were being acquired today StorageApps is being acquired by Hewlett Packard for million and Amber Networks is being acquired by Nokia for million If I am not mistaken these are the largest technology acquisitions of where only a handful of acquisitions have been made in total all year Net gains to Enron on both of these investments which were both made in will be small but the acquisitions are a verification of EBS Ventures ability to pick the best telecom investments in the market no other single investor is in both of these deals Steven Sheldon and Patrick Hickey deserve tremendous credit for originating and managing these investments Thanks Kevin Garland Enron Principal Investments

Enron Principal Investments Presentation Issues Advance Notice Cc Jeff and Andy I wanted to make you both aware of a component of Enron Principal Investments proposed strategy prior to presenting to you next week We are proposing to raise a traditional private equity fund to provide the capital for EPIs investing efforts I have been researching the pros and cons of a fund including talking with Bill Brown Michael Kopper and others who have worked on these at Enron in the past In this case I believe the positives sufficiently outweigh the negatives Of course if EPI pursues this fund it would be done inconjunction with the finance group Here are my assumptions Fund Structure Total Fund Size million Enrons Commitment million Institutional Investors million Enrons Management fees Enron Carried Interest LP Preferred Return Investment Period years Fund Life years This would be structured as a traditional private equity fund structured using normal market terms Negatives Reduced flexibility Manage for IRR not earnings Exclusivity issues Positives Reduces Enrons ongoing capital requirements Greater capital availability to EPI Secure a dedicated funding source Generate a leveraged return for Enron and annual management fees Allow for retention of key personnel over the long term We can discuss this at length in our presentation but I wanted to give you advanced notice Thanks Kevin Garland

Enron Principal Investments Developmentsheaded monster Dave Ken and Greg For the next days I will be dealing with many integration logistical and new strategy issues During that time I will provide you with a weekly update email as to our activities Once I have our new strategy mostly baked I will schedule a meeting to get your collective views and feedback I expect that will be at the end of July After that I hope to have regular monthly meetings with you Meanwhile here is what is happening Personnel Top priority was to immediately address personnel issues My target is to reduce the people associated with this effort to an ideal structure of I concluded a week long interview and review process to select VPsDirectorsManagers The result was the following New Group MD Gene Humphrey will remain during a transition period months and will then retire this was consistent with his own goals VP Patrick Hickey EBS Barbara Paige EIP Dick Lydecker Special Assets his entire group remains in tact Jempy Neyman Special Assets Andrew Marsden EBS London Director Steven Sheldon EBS Kevin Kuykendall EWS John Godbold EIP John Enerson Special Assets Manager Kyle Kettler EWS Michel Nezi Marvin EBS Mark Gandy EBS Patrick Johnson Special Assets Mark Meier Special Assets Redeployed VP Jon Thomsen EBS Michael Miller EWS Director Charlie Vetters EWS Manager Mic Johns EIP Washington DC Jennifer Adams EWS Christain Hackett EBS London Andreas Kraemer EWS Fabricio Soares EIP Next we are evaluating the AnalystAssociatesAdmins This will be completed by June This will be decreased from people to people Integration A detailed integration plan is underway more in the coming weeks This will begin with a full day offsite on June th You are welcome to attend New Strategy We are working towards a new strategy and charter Funding sources Patrick Hickey is working with Shirley Hudler Michael Kopper and others to restructure part of JEDI II in order to optomize that vehicle for our investment needs This will hopefully take shape in the next days Thanks KG

Adams EWS Christain Hackett EBS London Andreas Kraemer EWS Fabricio Soares EIP Next we are evaluating the AnalystAssociatesAdmins This will be completed by June This will be decreased from people to needs This will hopefully take shape in the next days Thanks KG

Sale of Hanover Compressor Position Cc Recently EPI completed the sale of Enrons remaining equity ownership in Hanover Compressor I want to thank Dick Lydecker and Mark Meier who managed the sale of this investment for their very effective effort The total proceeds from the sale over the last months totals million The total return on the million Hanover Compressor investment was nearly million excluding substantial profits from other financing transactions with Hanover Kevin Howard and others have played an important role in this investment over the last several years The exit used a proprietary and confidential structure executed by Bear Stearns It is a true sale and there will be no remaining structures by the end of the year Our exit has not been made public This completes part of a continuous effort by EPI to sale many of Enrons remaining equity investment positions Thanks Kevin Garland Enron Principal Investments

Assessment of Global CrossingGreg As you asked I have taken a quick look at Global Crossing I think it is a close call but they certainly have a decent shot of making it by making it I mean the equity will have value and the company will not be restructured through bankruptcy Their assets customers and cash might marginally outweigh the debt load that the company has Most importantly they definitely have a currency Global Crossing stock that has more value than anything in EBS If there is a potential deal to contribute assets of EBS into Global Crossing in exchange for equity then I would recommend pursuing it even if it means contributing up to million in cash to get it done However I would make sure that Enron has no more contingent liabilities consolidated burn or cash commitments The real question is will Global Crossing want what we have at any price I suspect that once they perform due diligence they will run away just as the knights did when faced with the killer rabbit in Monte Pythons Search for the Holy Grail Thanks KG

Enron Principal Investments Organizational MemoLiz Below is a memo to be distributed to Enron worldwide from the Office of the Chairman of Enron Corp Please ask Greg to review and approve After his approval would you please make arrangements for its distribution Thanks KG Enron Principal Investments EPI which was formed in the nd quarter has completed its integration and the development of its new strategy This group will be responsible for identifying closing managing and exiting all nonEP equity investments for Enron worldwide Kevin Garland will lead EPI which includes Barbara Paige Andrew Marsden Kevin Kuykendall Steven Sheldon Michele Nezi Marvin and Mark Gandy Additionally Dick Lydecker and the Special Asset Group will continue to report to Kevin EPI will pursue investments related to Enrons core businesses where Enron has a unique insight into the market company or technology Initially this will be geographically focused in North America and Europe This group will rely heavily on the support and cooperation of the core business units to provide information and market insight To further encourage the business units to cooperate with this effort EPI will provide the business units with a carried interest on all profits from investments made related to that unit EPI may make investments in the form of venture capital leverage buyouts growth equity or private equity in public companies The group will not make investments in seed stage companies other funds subsidiaries of larger corporations or project equity Please join me in supporting the efforts of Enron Principal Investments

Sale of COPEL Shares Cc FYI Enron Principal Investments has completed the sale of Enrons ownership in COPEL Total proceeds for the last months from this sale is over million in cash Steven Sheldon managed this process In the last months EPI has sold or otherwise disposed of investments with total proceeds to Enron of over million in cash We intend to sell another by year end generating an additional million to million in cash The team is very focused on selling of the portfolio creating cash and minimizing losses Kevin Garland

More Enron Principal Investments HornbeckLeevac millionAnother transaction that was left off my report of yesterday KG Original Message From Lydecker Jr Richard Sent Thursday July AM To Garland Kevin Cc Fastow Andrew Donahue Jeff Neyman Jesse Morris Brandi Subject HornbeckLeevac million HornbeckLeevac has prepaid the full principal of million on its loan The original term was a bullet payment in This is the culmination of an extended negotiationpersuasion of the Company and its Board which includes SCF which had to be dragged kicking and screaming to the transaction Jempy has the lead on Hornbeck and Brandi is the alternate Both did an outstanding job We also extracted a K consent fee for the Companys high yield debt offering part of the proceeds of which was used to take us out The loan was on the books for million There was a net million earnings pickup on the transaction in addition to a major recovery of capital We retain our warrants The objective is to monetize by yearend Expected value million net to Enron

Enron Principal Investments UpdateHere is an update of our activities All of my standard reports should be completed by the end of next week which will allow me to provide thorough and concise report of all positions and values Portfolio Management Completed assignment of all portfolio companies to senior team members Sold stake in Paladin Resources a UK public EP company for p totaling million This was a good price average price LTM of p but was below the quarter end price Therefore there is a Q loss of million Andrew Marsden is managing this in London Completed all requirements to sell COPEL shares a million investment in the Brazilian utility Began selling shares on Current price is approximately million below carrying value of approximately million Likely to take a couple of months to exit entire position Investment is carried as Strategic and any losses upon the sale will fall below the line in the sale of nonmerchant asset line Steven Sheldon is managing this Completed negotiations on the sale of Utiliquest for million Should sign on Thursday Enron had invested million in cash net of JEDI II and will receive million The sale will net a cash gain to Enron but below our carrying value of million yielding a million accounting loss Kevin Kuykendall is managing this Finalized processes to begin selling Hanover Compressor shares We own million shares which are trading at share for a total value of million Hanover has been hedged through Raptor However the structure that was used to hedge is a costless collar that leaves Enron exposed below share Therefore at current trading levels we are facing a million loss We are working with CSFB which has proposed to execute a block trade sale However the stock continues to decline each day and CSFB will not make an offer until the price stabilizes If we have to sell at a block discount or if the price continues to fall we could be facing a million to million loss Needless to say we are very focused on this investment Losses from Venture Capital positions appear to be approximately million for Q which is primarily the result of writeoffs in the HEOF portfolio Net quarterly expectations Cash proceeds received from sales million losses from sales below carrying value million million above the line and million below the line Integration All personnel decisions made Legal Gil Melman RAC Randy Petersen accounting Hope Vargas HR Sheila Walton and Tax Jim Sandt support personnel determined Everyone moving to same location EB today Preparation of nd half budget revenue and expense still in process To be completed by Back office systems and filing systems in process of integration To be completed by Process Standardization Mid stream of development of deal filtering deal evaluation and due diligence modeling approval portfolio management and exit all to be completed by Need to develop permanent approval process including approval limits Strategy Development Strategy is currently being vetted through a collaborative process including all senior members of the group and RAC Final drafting session for page strategycharter paper and page powerpoint presentation scheduled for July Presentation of strategy to Greg and Ken is scheduled for July to Jeff Skilling on August Other Issues Given Andy Fastows involvement with Corp Dev and our groups need for capital I would like to add Andy to the Investment Committee Please provide feedback Thanks KG

Draft of Organizational Announcementthe Formation of One Corporate Equity Investing Unit To better develop and manage equity investment opportunities related to our core businesses Enron has formed one corporate equity investment unit This new unit Enron Principal Investments will combine the existing investment units of ENA EBS and Enron Investment Partners The strategy of Enron Principal Investments will be to work with the all the business units across Enron to identify execute and manage equity investments which leverage the unique and proprietary knowledge of Enron These investments may be in the form of venture capital LBOs traditional private equity and distressed debt positions Kevin Garland will serve as Managing Director overseeing all activities of Enron Principal Investments Michael Miller and Gene Humphrey will both join Enron Principal Investments as senior investment professionals in the group Additionally many other legacy investment positions existing in Enron will be transferred to Enron Principal Investments Richard Lydecker will continue to manage these legacy investments This new investment unit will report to Greg Whalley in his capacity as an Enron Policy Committee member Please join me in congratulating and supporting Kevin Michael Gene Richard and the other members of this group in this effort Jeff Skilling

EBS Mark Gandy EBS Patrick Johnson Special Assets Mark Meier Special Assets Redeployed VP Jon Thomsen EBS Michael Miller EWS Director Charlie Vetters EWS Manager Mic Johns EIP Washington DC Jennifer Adams EWS Christain Hackett EBS London Andreas Kraemer EWS Fabricio Soares EIP Next we are evaluating the AnalystAssociatesAdmins This will be completed by June This will be decreased from people to people Integration A detailed integration plan is underway more in the coming weeks This will begin with a full day offsite on June th You are welcome to attend New Strategy We are working towards a new strategy and charter Funding sources Patrick Hickey is working with Shirley Hudler Michael Kopper and others to restructure part of JEDI II in order to optomize that vehicle for our investment needs This will hopefully take shape in the next days Thanks KG

FW Draft of Organizational Announcementis a draft of the organizational announcement Please provide comments KG Subject Draft of Organizational Announcement Announcing the Formation of One Corporate Equity Investing Unit To better develop and manage equity investment opportunities related to our core businesses Enron has formed one corporate equity investment unit This new unit Enron Principal Investments will combine the existing investment units of ENA EBS and Enron Investment Partners Additionally the Enron Special Asset Group will also become part of Enron Principal Investments The strategy of Enron Principal Investments will be to work with the all the business units of Enron to identify execute and manage equity investments which leverage the Enrons unique and proprietary knowledge These investments may be in the form of venture capital LBOs traditional private equity and distressed debt positions Kevin Garland will serve as Managing Director overseeing all activities of Enron Principal Investments Gene Humphrey Michael Miller Dick Lydecker and their groups will join Kevin and his group to form this new investments unit This new group will report to an investment committee consisting of Greg Whalley Ken Rice and Dave Delainey Please join me in congratulating and supporting Kevin Gene Michael Dick and the other members of this group in this effort Jeff Skilling

FW Draft of Organizational Announcement Cc been reviewed by HR and Gene Humphrey Please respond with any comments It is intended to go out on Tuesday at noon I will have the reorg group meeting Tuesday morning KG Announcing the Formation of One Corporate Equity Investing Unit To better develop and manage equity investment opportunities related to our core businesses Enron has formed one corporate equity investment unit This new unit Enron Principal Investments will combine the existing investment units of ENA EBS and Enron Investment Partners Additionally the Enron Wholesale Restructuring Group will also become part of Enron Principal Investments The strategy of Enron Principal Investments will be to work with the all the business units of Enron to identify execute and manage equity investments which leverage the Enrons unique and proprietary knowledge These investments may be in the form of venture capital LBOs traditional private equity and distressed debt positions Kevin Garland will serve as Managing Director of Enron Principal Investments overseeing all of its activities Gene Humphrey Michael Miller Richard Lydecker and their groups will join Kevin and his group to form this new investments unit This new investment unit will report to Greg Whalley in his capacity as an Enron Policy Committee member Please join me in congratulating and supporting Kevin Gene Michael Richard and the other members of this group in this effort Jeff Skilling

Draft of Organizational Announcementthe Formation of One Corporate Equity Investing Unit To better develop and manage equity investment opportunities related to our core businesses Enron has formed one corporate equity investment unit This new unit Enron Principal Investments will combine the existing investment units of ENA EBS and Enron Investment Partners The strategy of Enron Principal Investments will be to work with the all the business units across Enron to identify execute and manage equity investments which leverage the unique and proprietary knowledge of Enron These investments may be in the form of venture capital LBOs traditional private equity and distressed debt positions Kevin Garland will serve as Managing Director overseeing all activities of Enron Principal Investments Michael Miller and Gene Humphrey will both join Enron Principal Investments as senior investment professionals in the group Additionally many other legacy investment positions existing in Enron will be transferred to Enron Principal Investments Richard Lydecker will continue to manage these legacy investments This new investment unit will report to Greg Whalley in his capacity as an Enron Policy Committee member Please join me in congratulating and supporting Kevin Michael Gene Richard and the other members of this group in this effort Jeff Skilling

Enron Principal Investments Developmentsheaded monster Dave Ken and Greg For the next days I will be dealing with many integration logistical and new strategy issues During that time I will provide you with a weekly update email as to our activities Once I have our new strategy mostly baked I will schedule a meeting to get your collective views and feedback I expect that will be at the end of July After that I hope to have regular monthly meetings with you Meanwhile here is what is happening Personnel Top priority was to immediately address personnel issues My target is to reduce the people associated with this effort to an ideal structure of I concluded a week long interview and review process to select VPsDirectorsManagers The result was the following New Group MD Gene Humphrey will remain during a transition period months and will then retire this was consistent with his own goals VP Patrick Hickey EBS Barbara Paige EIP Dick Lydecker Special Assets his entire group remains in tact Jempy Neyman Special Assets Andrew Marsden EBS London Director Steven Sheldon EBS Kevin Kuykendall EWS John Godbold EIP John Enerson Special Assets Manager Kyle Kettler EWS Michel Nezi Marvin EBS Mark Gandy EBS Patrick Johnson Special Assets Mark Meier Special Assets Redeployed VP Jon Thomsen EBS Michael Miller EWS Director Charlie Vetters EWS Manager Mic Johns EIP Washington DC Jennifer Adams EWS Christain Hackett EBS London Andreas Kraemer EWS Fabricio Soares EIP Next we are evaluating the AnalystAssociatesAdmins This will be completed by June This will be decreased from people to people Integration A detailed integration plan is underway more in the coming weeks This will begin with a full day offsite on June th You are welcome to attend New Strategy We are working towards a new strategy and charter Funding sources Patrick Hickey is working with Shirley Hudler Michael Kopper and others to restructure part of JEDI II in order to optomize that vehicle for our investment needs This will hopefully take shape in the next days Thanks KG
